member.name: T:CarShop.Console.MainMenu
member.summary: Main Menu class is responsible for displaying and selecting Menu Items.

member.summary: This is used by the StartMenu method. If true the Method will break.

member.summary: Displays all of the Sub Menu-s of the Main Menu

member.summary: Selects a Sub Menu from the Sub Menus.

member.name: M:CarShop.Console.MainMenu.StartMenu
member.summary: Menu Loop. It will display the menu and ask for selection until the private field exit is not set to true by using the E command

member.name: M:CarShop.Console.MenuItems.CreateBrand.SetMonth
member.summary: Sets the month the foundatin. If no month was given than it will be 01 atumatically.
member.returns: return month if valid or 01 if no month was provided.
